quality_guaranteed_text: We only sell authentic products with a full guarantee
fast_delivery_text: Receive your shoes in 1 to 3 business days
secure_payment_text: Multiple payment options with enhanced security

home.discover_popular: Discover the most popular products in our shop

footer.title: YouShoes
footer.description: Premium shoes for every occasion. Quality and comfort guaranteed.

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Start shopping to add items to your cart.

thanks.title: Thank you for your order!
thanks.subtitle: Your order has been successfully placed.
thanks.whatsapp_message: You will receive a WhatsApp message with your order details shortly.

contact.pageSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below.
contact.privacyNotice: We care about your data. Read our

successMessage.title: Message Sent Successfully!
successMessage.subtitle: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you shortly.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect only the necessary data to process your requests and improve our services.
dataCollection.note: This may include your name, email, shipping address, and purchase history.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We never share or sell your data to third parties.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You can contact us at any time to request deletion or access to your personal data.
yourRights.subtitle: Your rights include:
list: The right to access your personal data
The right to rectify inaccurate personal data
The right to request deletion of your personal data
The right to restrict processing of your personal data

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: For more information, please contact our support team.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction or damage.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can adjust your cookie settings at any time through your browser settings.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Support
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: We couldn't find any FAQs matching your search.

contactSection.title: Still have questions?
contactSection.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please feel free to reach out to our customer support team.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer: You can track your order by clicking on the Track icon in the Navbar.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery for unused items.

questions.question: Can I change my shipping address?
questions.answer: Yes, contact our support team before the item ships.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. View details.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click Forgot Password on the login page and follow the instructions.

shipping-policy.title: Shipping Policy
shipping-policy.subtitle: Everything you need to know about shipping your orders

at-glance.title: At a Glance
at-glance.description: We aim to ship all orders within 1-2 business days.

international-shipping.title: International Shipping

shipping-costs.title: Shipping Costs
shipping-costs.description: We currently deliver across Morocco. Shipping costs are based on your location.
shipping-costs.other-cities-cost: Other cities: Delivery cost ranges between 20 DH and 30 DH

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: For questions about shipping fees or delivery times, please

tracking.info: You can also track your order anytime from your account dashboard.

delays.title: Delays & Issues
delays.description: If your order is delayed or lost, please
delays.warning: Please note that during peak seasons (holidays, special promotions), delays of 1-3 days may occur.

footer.title: Have more questions?
footer.description: Check our comprehensive FAQ section or reach out to our customer service team.

about.title: Store Information
about.subtitle: Welcome to our specialized shoe store in Morocco!

delivery.title: Delivery Information
delivery.fast_delivery: Fast delivery within 24 to 72 hours to all cities in Morocco.
delivery.delivery_cost: Delivery cost 20 MAD for all other cities.
delivery.support: 24/7 technical support to answer all your inquiries.
delivery.return_policy: Easy return policy within 7 days of receipt.

important_note.title: Important Note
important_note.message: We guarantee you product quality, fast delivery and excellent customer service.
important_note.thanks: Thank you for your trust in us!

order-not-found-component.title: Order Not Found
order-not-found-component.subtitle: We couldn't locate the order you're looking for.
order-not-found-component.reasons-intro: There might be several reasons why your order couldn't be found:
order-not-found-component.reason-incorrect: The order number might be incorrect
order-not-found-component.reason-cancelled: The order might have been cancelled
order-not-found-component.reason-system: There might be a temporary system issue
order-not-found-component.error-message: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team for assistance.
order-not-found-component.help-message: Need help with your order? Contact our customer service through WhatsApp.
